name: An Expected Lie
desc: The recipient of the shipment is actually the "long dead" Edwin. Although his mental state seems a bit worrying, and he constantly repeats the number "five"... he seems to have surreptitiously pointed out Nacker's current whereabouts. What is this "resurrected" researcher planning? Regardless of what it may be, the important matter at hand is capturing Nacker...

customize.name: An Expected Plan
customize.desc: After a thorough investigation, the Fontaine Research Institute seems to have found a lead on Nacker and the Arkhium Kinetic Core. Now, all that's left is to bring him to justic.

customize.name: An Expected Plan
customize.desc: After a thorough investigation, the Fontaine Research Institute seems to have found a lead on Nacker and the Arkhium Kinetic Core. Now, all that's left is to bring him to justic.

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.text:
Head to Nacker's hideout
Open the sealed door
Find Nacker
Defeat the incoming meka
Defeat Nacker
Rejoin Lemarcq
Report back to the Fontaine Research Institute
